The Quranic researcher, see how your Lord did, etc.; For he is a martyrdom of his knowledge, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him Tarika: Did you not see the pilgrim, who was wicked in his Lord.And his grace said: Did you not see that they are in every valley, and they said, and Abu Hayyan said: He who appears that he is a deleted deletion that is indicated by what he accepted from the last of him Their return, then we have their account and its appreciation: their return to us and their account on us.Ibn al -Mundhir narrated from Ibn Mas'oud, may God be pleased with him, that he read: and the dawn to his saying of his grace: if he is easy, then he said: “This is a division of Ali The division of the son of Al -Anbari.And on the authority of a fighter that he is: Is that...Etc., and in the sense of "that" and he is invalid as a narration and a know -how; As he has a division without a division on him.What is meant is the same as the children of Aad Bin Asia ibn Iram bin Sam ibn Noah, peace be upon him Him is a great metaphor until it was attached to the truth, and it was said to their first people, the first, and for their shame, the hereafter is the last.The pillar of Al -Din Bin Katheer said: Whenever he is mentioned in the Qur’an, he is a good news, so what is meant is a return in it the first is the first of what is in the wall of the endowment, and it is also said to them, as well With a wonderful grandfather, it is also a name for the first, and the saying of Ibn al -Raqiyat: ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ ؎ You see their enemy ∗∗∗ from the weaving of David or what I have inherited
